Interactive Linear Algebra Toolkit._content: Tech Stack:  Python, Streamlit, NumPy, Plotly, Matplotlib • Developed a web-based toolkit using Python and Streamlit to visualize linear algebra concepts. • Implemented Gaussian elimination, Gauss-Jordan elimination, 2D/3D matrix transformations, and PCA using eigen decomposition and SVD. • Designed interactive interfaces to bridge theory with practical understanding. • Challenges : Overcoming the challenge of visualizing complex 2D/3D matrix operations interactively while keeping the interface intuitive and responsive.

AI for Pneumonia Detection using Deep Le._content: Tech Stack:  TensorFlow, Keras, EfficientNetB0, MobileNetV2, Grad-CAM, Streamlit • Developed and deployed a deep learning app to classify chest X-rays as Pneumonia or Normal in real time. • Trained MobileNetV2 and EfficientNetB0 with data augmentation, early stopping, and ResNet50-based knowledge distillation. • Integrated Grad-CAM for visual explanation of predictions, enhancing interpretability in medical imaging. • Achieved 96% accuracy and 0.995 AUC using a dynamic confidence-weighted ensemble. • Challenges : Handling class imbalance, training multiple models efficiently, and integrating Grad-CAM for real-time interpretability in medical imaging.

Retrieval-Augmented Resume Chatbot._content: Tech Stack:   Python, Flask, Gunicorn, GPT-4o, rank_bm25, deep-translator • Developed a hybrid RAG system integrating OpenAI embeddings with FAISS for semantic search and BM25 as an automatic fallback, ensuring reliable retrieval even during GPT API quota limits. • Implemented real-time resume synchronization using Notion integration with hash-based change detection, enabling automatic update of embeddings and search indices with zero downtime. • Designed a context-aware conversational interface supporting multilingual input, 5-message history tracking with visual context feedback, and strict response guardrails to maintain accuracy within resume scope.
